message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your proposal, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I would like to suggest a counteroffer of $1,050,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, however,  $1,150,000 is already a fairly aggressive discount on this product's true value. To make a deal work, I could meet you halfway at $1,100,000. This offer reflects the immense value this product brings.

I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for considering my previous offer. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,075,000 for the product. This still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of the product.
